// This file shows some examples of constraint literals with elided interfaces.
// These examples are permitted if proposal issue #48424 is accepted.
<原文结束>

// These examples are permitted if proposal issue #48424 is accepted.
# <翻译结束>

// so it can also not be used as a constraint.
